name: Fire Arms Source Theme Flattener
description:
Beta of Removing of the gradients and cleaning up the sides. I hate vBulliten.
Version 0.4 Changelong
* removed block on ".textcontrols a, a.textcontrol " as it was causing problems with rep not being displayed.
* fixed navtab being oddly shaped after removal of gradient.
* removed .above_threadlist_controls gradient.
Version 0.3 Changelog
* Fixed gradient in thread controls.
* Fixed gradients in wgo block
Version 0.2 Changelog
* Fixed margin on Navbar.
Version 0.1 Changelog
* Fixed an issue with Rep images being mistakenly blocked.
* Fixed the gradient showing on the control panel page.
* Fixed Gradient being shown in PM message lists.
* Fixed gradient being shown in FAQ page.
